content: I'm trying to optimize my daily commute. I've been taking the 7:15 AM train to work every day, and I've noticed that it's always more crowded on Mondays and Fridays. Do you have any suggestions on how I can get a seat more easily on those days? By the way, I've been reading a lot on my commute, just finished "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" last month, and it was amazing.
